entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Chetwynd
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chetwynd Airport 05:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -11.7°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -13.5°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog becoming fog patches early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
